scenario_name: Data Evasion Attack: Circumventing Loan Application Fraud Detection
description: A malicious actor attempts to evade loan application fraud detection systems by subtly altering applicant data to remain below detection thresholds. The attacker uses multiple iterations to refine the evasion strategy, learning from the system's responses.
initial_goal: Submit multiple loan applications, maximizing approval rates while minimizing the risk of fraud detection.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: Loan application processing and fraud detection
